title: autolocking
body: can league please have autolocking reportable. it really isnt reportable but its stupid

replies.body:
Blind pick is a great mode if you're ready to simply hop into a match and skip the bans + turns phase. If you'd prefer to not to play in this mode where players can potentially *autolock*, you can always play Normal or Ranked Draft mode.

Let me know if you have any questions.

In light of a communal call to change blind pick due to the removal of normals, is there any possibility of blind pick receiving the ability to call lanes or  get looked at in general? Perhaps choosing positions is treated like choosing straws or first come/click, first serve?

Why would autolocking be reportable? It's annoying sometimes, sure, but you have to work around your team composition. Sometimes people will autolock if you're playing normals, and you just gotta work around their and your team's pick of champion. Although really, a great solution to this would just to be playing draft pick. Buy a bunch of cheap champs.
